mapper.select: select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by ideal_snack_wins desc) as idealRanking, a.* from ideal_worldcup a) ranking2 where ranking2.idealRanking between ${start} and ${end}
select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by ideal_snack_wins desc) as idealRanking, a.* from ideal_worldcup a) ranking2 where ranking2.idealRanking between #{start} and #{end}
